Hi,


Thinking about the geometry, I believe that you actually need the following:


    tan(vv/2) / tan(hh/2) = (height/2) / (width /2)






    tan(vv/2) / tan(hh/2)  =  height  / width


solving for vv:


    vv = 2* atan( height / width  * tan(hh/2))


given:


    hh = 84
    height  = 576
    width = 1024


    vv = 53.7224 degrees


-Jack
